eng.post_failed_ind: Couldn't post. We are fixing this, please try again later.
eng.download_try_again: iOS: If the sticker is missing, try downloading again or use Android/PC/Mac. This is being fixed, apologies.
eng.new_story_confirm: Are you sure? You can't download current story after this.
eng.icon_panel_ind: Pick an icon. Tap again to close.

bm.post_failed_ind: Gagal dihantar. Kami sedang memperbaiki, sila cuba sebentar lagi.
bm.download_try_again: iOS: Cuba muat turun lagi jika sticker hilang, atau gunakan Android/PC/Mac. Kami sedang memperbaiki, harap maaf
bm.new_story_confirm: Adakah anda pasti? Cerita semasa tak boleh dimuat turun selepas ini.
bm.icon_panel_ind: Pilih ikon profile. Tekan semula untuk tutup.
